=SELECT 
  v.id,
  v.english_word,
  v.turkish_word,
  v.category,
  v.difficulty,
  COALESCE(wh.correct_count, 0) as correct_count,
  COALESCE(wh.incorrect_count, 0) as incorrect_count,
  COALESCE(wh.last_seen, '') as last_seen,
  COALESCE(wh.streak, 0) as streak,
  -- Calculate priority score inline
  CASE 
    WHEN wh.id IS NULL THEN 150.0  -- Never seen
    ELSE (
      100 + 
      (COALESCE(wh.incorrect_count, 0) * 30) +
      (CASE WHEN COALESCE(wh.streak, 0) < 3 THEN (3 - COALESCE(wh.streak, 0)) * 20 ELSE 0 END) +
      (CASE 
        WHEN julianday('now') - julianday(wh.last_seen) < 1 THEN -40
        WHEN julianday('now') - julianday(wh.last_seen) < 3 THEN -20
        ELSE (julianday('now') - julianday(wh.last_seen)) * 5
      END) +
      (CASE 
        WHEN (COALESCE(wh.correct_count, 0) + COALESCE(wh.incorrect_count, 0)) > 0 
        THEN (1 - (COALESCE(wh.correct_count, 0) * 1.0 / (COALESCE(wh.correct_count, 0) + COALESCE(wh.incorrect_count, 0)))) * 40
        ELSE 50
      END)
    )
  END as priority_score
FROM vocabulary v
LEFT JOIN word_history wh ON v.id = wh.word_id AND wh.user_id = '{{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.chat.id }}'
ORDER BY priority_score DESC
LIMIT 30;

=INSERT OR REPLACE INTO current_questions 
  (user_id, word_id, question_text, correct_answer, correct_word, turkish_word, english_word, exercise_type, options, created_at)
VALUES 
  ('{{ $json.userId }}', 
   {{ $json.wordId }}, 
   '{{ $json.question }}', 
   '{{ $json.correctAnswer }}', 
   '{{ $json.correctIndex }}', 
   '{{ $json.turkishWord }}', 
   '{{ $json.englishWord }}', 
   '{{ $json.exerciseType }}',
   '{{ JSON.stringify($json.options) }}',
   datetime('now'));

=-- Update or insert word history with single query
INSERT INTO word_history 
  (user_id, word_id, english_word, turkish_word, correct_count, incorrect_count, last_seen, streak, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES 
  ('{{ $json.userId }}',
   {{ $json.wordId }},
   '{{ $json.englishWord }}',
   '{{ $json.turkishWord }}',
   {{ $json.isCorrect ? 1 : 0 }},
   {{ $json.isCorrect ? 0 : 1 }},
   datetime('now'),
   {{ $json.isCorrect ? 1 : 0 }},
   datetime('now'),
   datetime('now'))
ON CONFLICT(user_id, word_id) DO UPDATE SET
  correct_count = correct_count + {{ $json.isCorrect ? 1 : 0 }},
  incorrect_count = incorrect_count + {{ $json.isCorrect ? 0 : 1 }},
  last_seen = datetime('now'),
  streak = CASE 
    WHEN {{ $json.isCorrect ? 'TRUE' : 'FALSE' }} THEN streak + 1 
    ELSE 0 
  END,
  updated_at = datetime('now');

=-- Update or insert user progress with single query
INSERT INTO user_progress 
  (user_id, user_name, total_questions, correct_answers, incorrect_answers, current_streak, best_streak, last_active, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES 
  ('{{ $json.userId }}',
   '{{ $json.userName }}',
   1,
   {{ $json.isCorrect ? 1 : 0 }},
   {{ $json.isCorrect ? 0 : 1 }},
   {{ $json.isCorrect ? 1 : 0 }},
   {{ $json.isCorrect ? 1 : 0 }},
   datetime('now'),
   datetime('now'),
   datetime('now'))
ON CONFLICT(user_id) DO UPDATE SET
  user_name = '{{ $json.userName }}',
  total_questions = total_questions + 1,
  correct_answers = correct_answers + {{ $json.isCorrect ? 1 : 0 }},
  incorrect_answers = incorrect_answers + {{ $json.isCorrect ? 0 : 1 }},
  current_streak = CASE 
    WHEN {{ $json.isCorrect ? 'TRUE' : 'FALSE' }} THEN current_streak + 1 
    ELSE 0 
  END,
  best_streak = CASE 
    WHEN {{ $json.isCorrect ? 'TRUE' : 'FALSE' }} AND (current_streak + 1) > best_streak THEN (current_streak + 1)
    ELSE best_streak
  END,
  last_active = datetime('now'),
  updated_at = datetime('now');

=SELECT 
  user_name,
  total_questions,
  correct_answers,
  incorrect_answers,
  ROUND(correct_answers * 100.0 / NULLIF(total_questions, 0), 1) as accuracy,
  current_streak,
  best_streak,
  datetime(last_active, 'localtime') as last_active
FROM user_progress
WHERE user_id = '{{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message.chat.id }}'
LIMIT 1;
